text: this is the text! use & for an extra long delay! also, if you dont want any text onscreen, still pass this variable or else itll print error text!
_comment delay, custom delay and amount: 'delay' is the delay between characters. 'custom delay' is the delay produced by using '&'. 'amount' is the amount of characters shown per cycle.
_comment important note: due to limitations in the godot engine, times passed bellow 0.05 seconds may result in
_comment end time: 'end time' is the ammout of seconds before the next line gets processed.
_comment icon and textbox: 'icon' is the Icon used in the dialog box, using an image file. recommended size: 128x128 px. 'textbox' allows you to change the textbox sprite. to return to default texture, use 'default'. recommended size: 960x320 px.
_comment textbox/icon color: 'textbox color' dictates the modulation of the textboxs border, 'icon color' dictates the modulation of the 'icon'.
_comment font: 'font' allows you to set the font for the line, if none is set itll default to the last set font.
